data.eml:eml: Taxonomic status of maskrays of the Neotrygon kuhlii species complex (Myliobatoidei: Dasyatidae) with the description of three new species from the Indo-West Pacific

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Last, Peter R., White, William T., Séret, Bernard (2016): Taxonomic status of maskrays of the Neotrygon kuhlii species complex (Myliobatoidei: Dasyatidae) with the description of three new species from the Indo-West Pacific. Zootaxa 4083 (4): 533-561, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4083.4.5
